criterion: Asks for clarification on the user's query
Provides general information about Q fever
Mentions the importance of seeking medical attention for Q fever symptoms
Incorrectly states that Q fever is caused by a virus
Provides overly technical or medical jargon in response
Does not mention the importance of reporting Q fever cases to local health authorities
Mentions that Q fever is a common disease in the region
Asks the user about their symptoms and medical history
Provides a list of common Q fever symptoms
Mentions the role of ticks in transmitting Q fever
